channel.title: Comments on: Send Action Queries to Your Database in Batches
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.description: The old one was called Mailers+4 (Melissa Data), the new one was Mailroom Toolkit Architect (Satori Software). Melissa Data offered a library to use in automation but it was more expensive, and its' API didn't seem as rich. Its' been a while though, probably worth another look.
item.content:encoded: The old one was called Mailers+4 (Melissa Data), the new one was Mailroom Toolkit Architect (Satori Software). Melissa Data offered a library to use in automation but it was more expensive, and its’ API didn’t seem as rich. Its’ been a while though, probably worth another look.

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: Out of curiosity, Alex, what is the address standardization tool that you use(d)? I could have used this sort of thing in my previous life...
item.content:encoded: Out of curiosity, Alex, what is the address standardization tool that you use(d)? I could have used this sort of thing in my previous life…
